reviewText: I've been a fan of Counting Cars since it first came on.  I really like the show (and others) on DVD because I can watch a bunch of episodes one after another.  I would have liked it more if it had a blooper reel or other outtakes.If you like the show, buy this one when the price is right.
summary: Buy it if you like this show
Title: Counting Cars: Season 2, Volume 1

reviewText: 13 Episodes on 2 Discs= FUN! Starting with You Talkin' to Me? & ending with Day of Judgement. Features include:Count's Coffin Couch, Chumlee & his Lincoln Flip & Lyle & Beverly. If U Dig Danny, you'll LUV this!
Title: Counting Cars: Season 2, Volume 1

reviewText: I love this series and I watch it whenever it is on. I like how all of the guys interact with each other and that threw all of the chaos they create the most beautiful cars and bikes I have ever seen,
Title: Counting Cars: Season 2, Volume 1

reviewText: Great series waiting for season 3.  We visited the shop this summer and they treat you well.  Would buy again every year.
Title: Counting Cars: Season 2, Volume 1

reviewText: This Series is awesome. I love this Season. The DVD's and Case were in great condition. I would absolutely buy this again.
Title: Counting Cars: Season 2, Volume 1
